name: West Coast Waverider
description:
Chill out on the surf by yourself or have a friend jump in and duke it out in a frantic battle on the waves!

Get close to the rocks to charge your boost, then unleash it to pull off some sweet moves or take down the other surfers.

Controls

Player 1
WASD - Move
Space - Boost

Player 2
Arrow Keys - Move
Right-CTRL - Boost

Made over 48 hours for GGJ 17 by a few radical dudes.

  • Jon Murphy (@NuclearFriend): Code
  • Simon Boxer (@sboxle): Art
  • Az (@squareframe_mus): Music
  • Calum and Aerial (@Calumari_Audio): Sound
